Name: Hyundai
Description: Korean car manufacturer, which also manufactures heavy machinery.
Reason: Hyundai heavy machinery has been used in the demolition of Palestinian neighbourhoods in Jerusalem, benefiting them commercially from the Israeli occupation.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Hyundai cars or machinery. Don't sell Hyundai cars or machinery. Don't work for Hyundai.

Name: Mercedes Benz
Reason: Mercedes Benz opened a tech hub in Tel Aviv to develop connected cars technology, when it could have opened such a hub in any city in the world.
How to Boycott: Don't buy cars from Mercedes Benz. Don't work for Mercedes Benz.

Name: Rentalcars.com
Description: Rentalcars.com is a website owned by Booking Holdings.
Reason: Booking.com, whos parent company Booking Holdings owns Rentalcars.com, allows listings in occupied Palestinian territory, and after initially deciding to add a label to properties which are in occupied territory, reversed that move under pressure from Israel.
How to Boycott: Don't rent from on Rentalcars.com. Book directly with businesses. They usually offer discounts and similar terms for direct bookings. Don't list your products on Rentalcars.com. Don't work for Booking Holdings.
Alternatives: Book directly with the hiring company.
